name: Adventures in Music Program - Grades 1-5
description: Adventures In Music (AIM) reaches every single student in grades 1– 5 in every San Francisco public elementary school, thus serving every neighborhood and touching a broad economic and cultural cross-section of the population. The Adventures in Music (AIM) Program includes: - Aim Ensembles (in-school Performances) - Private concert by the SF Symphony - Curriculum materials (classroom materials, workbook journal, assessment,evaluation) and more!

howToGetIt: All participation is available through the San Francisco Public School District ONLY.
address: 201 Van Ness Avenue, San Francisco, CA, 94102
